    • Uses of FacesMessage.Severity in javax.faces.application

      Fields in javax.faces.application declared as FacesMessage.Severity 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FacesMessage.Severity FacesMessage.SEVERITY_ERROR
      Message severity level indicating that an error has occurred.
      static FacesMessage.Severity FacesMessage.SEVERITY_FATAL
      Message severity level indicating that a serious error has occurred.
      static FacesMessage.Severity FacesMessage.SEVERITY_INFO
      Message severity level indicating an informational message rather than an error.
      static FacesMessage.Severity FacesMessage.SEVERITY_WARN
      Message severity level indicating that an error might have occurred.
      Methods in javax.faces.application that return FacesMessage.Severity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FacesMessage.Severity FacesMessage.getSeverity()
      Return the severity level.
      Methods in javax.faces.application with parameters of type FacesMessage.Severity

    • Uses of FacesMessage.Severity in javax.faces.context

      Methods in javax.faces.context that return FacesMessage.Severity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract FacesMessage.Severity FacesContext.getMaximumSeverity()
      Return the maximum severity level recorded on any FacesMessages that has been queued, whether or not they are associated with any specific UIComponent.
      FacesMessage.Severity FacesContextWrapper.getMaximumSeverity()
      The default behavior of this method is to call FacesContext.getMaximumSeverity() on the wrapped FacesContext object.
